note: I'm a 38 year old guy from Australia who's been programming for as long as I remember.  Jack of all trades, master of some.

summary.html:
The IndieWeb WordPress community could use some more theme options. Let's get together as a community and host a Theme raising (a play on the idea of the old barn raising).
We can all work/hack together to make some of the popular WordPress themes more IndieWeb friendly. We'll discuss methods for ad...

content.html: Native instruments when they released the s88 refused to admit they used a fatar keybed and even went so far as to deny it had a fatar Keynes, but people kept saying it was a TP100.. here we are, straight outta the s88, smelling of coffee.
